long description: Unlimited Local/STD calls -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity. Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.10/min (MRP 149) & tariff @ Rs 0.30/min (MRP 348) will be applicable -- Unlimited 4G/3G/2G data per day for 4G handsets only (Speed to reduce @80Kbps post 1GB).Applicable to new prepaid acquisitions within 30 calendar days from the day of recharge of First Recharge Offer (STV 352 till 31st March 2017)
